question_text: A company stores user data in AWS. The data is used continuously with peak usage during business hours. Access patterns vary, with some data not being used for months at a time. A solutions architect must choose a cost-effective solution that maintains the highest level of durability while maintaining high availability. Which storage solution meets these requirements?

options.D: Amazon S3 One Zone-Infrequent Access (S3 One Zone-IA)
